action.action-desc: Mr. Fitzpatrick (for himself, Mrs. Bustos, Mr. Young of Alaska, and Mr. King of New York) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committee on Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend MAP–21 to improve contracting opportunities for veteran-owned small business concerns, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fairness to Veterans for Infrastructure Investment Act of 2015.
Section 1101(b) of MAP–21 (23 U.S.C. 101 note) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (2) by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: The term veteran-owned small business concern has the meaning given the term small business concern owned and controlled by veterans in section 3(q) of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 632(q)).

paragraph.text: in paragraph (3) by inserting and veteran-owned small business concerns before the period at the end; and

subparagraph.text: in clause (ii) by striking and at the end;
in clause (iii) by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
